text: The White Lotus is an American Dark Comedy Drama anthology series which is created by Mike White for HBO released on July 11, 2021. In this series the guests and the staff spent a week at a global luxury resort hotel chain. The first season of this series is filmed in Hawaii, the second in Sicily and the third in Thailand. == Release and Budget == The cost of production was under US$3 Million per episode in season 1 and same as in season 2, according to Vultures. The first series was released on 21 July, 2021, on HBO and HBO Max. In United Kingdom and Republic of Ireland, the season was released on Sky Atlantic on 16 August, 2021. == References == Category:American comedy-drama television series Category:HBO television series
